AND TOTAL_OVER_DUE > 0 AND ( LOCAL_BAR_STATUS = 'D' OR LOCAL_BAR_STATUS is NULL)
Configuration.Query1: INSERT INTO AAAAAA (BSCODE, MSISDN, CO_ID, CORPORATE_CODE, TOTAL_OVER_DUE, OVER_DUE_LOCAL, OVER_DUE_IR, AVG_PAYMENT, AVG_INVOICE, LAST_INVOICE, REMARKS, CUSTCODE, BAR_DAYS, REFRESH_DATE, NOTIFY_DAYS, DUE_BAR_DATE) Select BSCODE, SUBSTR(MSISDN,4,10) AS MSISDN, CO_ID, CORPORATE_CODE,TOTAL_OVER_DUE, OVER_DUE_LOCAL, Over_DUE_IR, AVG_PAYMENT, AVG_INVOICE, LAST_INVOICE,REMARKS, CUSTCODE, '?' Configuration.SqlQuery1: Select BSCODE, MSISDN, REFRESH_DATE FROM AAAAAA WHERE TRUNC(SYSDATE) = REFRESH_DATE AND NOTIFY_DAYS = ?
